name: Isla Nubis
description:
Welcome to the Isla Nubis, the archipelago in the clouds!

Meet Zora, a young adventurous girl who was born to fly, and her trusty companion, Coralie, a cute cloud turtle!

A game made for the Volcano Game Jam 2020

Features:

Islands to explore by foot.

Soar through the skies on the back of your trusty cloud turtle.

Help characters around the archipelago with their issues and get to know them!

Controls:

Ground: WASD to move

Flight: W to go forward, arrows to rotate

E: contextual action

Q: skip dialogue/cancel flight
